subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A new DVR [7 Attachments]
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1240242792
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
I strictly use Olympus recorders.  Right now I am using a DS-30 and a  
DS-40.  They have full stereo recording capability as well as voice  activation. 
 And they work great!  I also have a Sony which my wife  wanted but 
honestly the audio quality is nowhere the same.  You will like  your Olympus.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/19/2009 10:45:00 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
[_Attachment(s)_ (mip://044d75e8/default.html#TopText)  from Frank  
Sumption included below] 

I bought a Radio Shack digital recored years, and never liked it much. I  
picked up an Olympus WS-21S this afternoon on a whim. I made a line to mic  
adapter, and did a couple box recordings. I don't know, might be better than  
tape. I has the advantage of of built in USB connector, and it records in 
WMA  format. 
 
 I tried a short recording last night using the tones in 51, I don't  think 
they help. 
 
 Frank-S
